participant_1.name: Alex
participant_1.personality: Adventurous and outgoing, enjoys exploring new activities and has a love for animals.
participant_1.background: i've three dogs. my father was a door to door salesman. i like to watch the olympics. i'm in an open polyamorous relationship. i also have a dog walking business.

participant_2.name: Jake

participant_2.background: i like to go to country concerts on weekends. i own two vintage mustangs. my favorite music is country. i've two dogs.
